data.title: Lindsay Pollock
data.text: __Secure-3PSIDC C1 yearCookie necessary for the use of the options and services of the website. Property of google.comCONSENT17 yearsGoogle cookie consent tracker. Property of google.comcookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics1 yearCookie necessary for the use of the options and services of the website. This cookie is set by the GDPR cookie consent add-on. The cookie is used to store user consent for cookies in the "Analytics" category.cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary1 yearThis cookie is set by the GDPR cookie consent add-on. Cookies are used to store user consent for cookies in the "Necessary" category. Cookie necessary for the use of the website options and services.ct-ultimate-gdprcookie12 monthsCookie necessary for the use of the options and services of the website. This Cookie is set by the GDPR Plugin and is used to store whether or not the user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.ct-ultimate-gdprcookie-level12 monthsCookie necessary for the use of the options and services of the website. It is used to know what level of cookies the user has accepted.PHPSESSIDSessionThis cookie is native to PHP applications. The cookie is used to store and identify a user's unique session ID in order to manage the user's session on the website. The cookie is a session cookie and is deleted when all browser windows are closed.SEARCH_SAMESITE2 monthsSameSite prevents the browser from sending this cookie along with cross-site requests. The main objective is to mitigate the risk of cross-origin information leakage. It also provides some protection against cross-site request forgery attacks. Owned by google.comwordpress_test_cookieSessionThis cookie is used for the WordPress content manager to check if the browser has cookies enabled.__Secure-3PAPISID10 monthsThese cookies are used to deliver ads more relevant to you and your interests. Owned by google.com__Secure-3PSID2 yearsThese cookies are used to deliver ads more relevant to you and your interests. Owned by google.com_ga2 yearsGoogle Analytics cookie that enables the unique visits control function. The first time a user enters the website through a browser this cookie will be installed. When this user re-enters the website with the same browser, the cookie will consider that it is the same user. Only in the event that the user changes browser, it will be considered another user.
